channel.title: Endonomdo on Virtualzone Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Endonomdo on Virtualzone Blog

item.title: Export trainings from Endomondo as GPX files
item.description: I’ve been using Endomondo for years to track my trainings. However, I’ve been experiencing a lot of issues with Endomondo over the last months: Sometimes it’s not possible to log in. Other times, my trainings won’t get synced. So it’s time a new app. I’ve decided to give Strava a try. With a few lines of code, I’ve managed to export all my training data as GPX files. These can be imported to Strava, so my training history won’t get lost.
